snippet.title: Half-Life: Comfy Maps (Full Map, No Commentary)
snippet.description:
"First of all, its just one map but the sun is in a different position. Second of all, I DID NOT KNOW this was a puzzle map!

I thought this was one of those maps where you just sit there and do nothing. Sure you can do that with all of the Half-Life maps or any game for that matter. But when I first went into this map, I thought there wasn't anything else to it. Just good atmosphere.

But then, noclipped out of the map to see if the developer has placed down some easter eggs. (They have. You'll have to find them yourself.) This sent me down a rabbit hole of me trying to figure out what kind of puzzle this 'easter egg' revealed. I then found the crowbar when I was trying to get a good screen shot. This made me realize this wasn't just a 'comfy' map. It was an escape room.

I had fun discovering what secrets this map holds. I would highly recommend playing this yourself."

Get it: https://www.runthinkshootlive.com/posts/comfy-maps/

=================

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/jeriahtheforestlizard/
